# Know Bloodline (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]] 

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Lost Empires of Faerun (Wotc), pg. 32

When you cast this spell, you learn the basic ancestry of the subject creature. The information revealed includes the subject's type, race, subrace, and all subtypes the creature possesses.

**GM Note**

Mulhorandi priests have used this spell for millennia to select humans of the purest Mulan bloodlines to follow the path of the glorious servant.

In the World of Greyhawk campaign setting, this spell is used by [[The Scarlet Brotherhood (Affiliation)|the Scarlet Brotherhood]] to further their breeding program.
